metadata.title: CVE-2024-43370 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: gettext.js is a GNU gettext port for node and the browser. There is across-site scripting (XSS) injection if `.po` dictionary definition filesare corrupted. This vulnerability has been patched in version 2.0.3. As aworkaround, control the origin of the definition catalog to prevent the useof this flaw in the definition of plural forms.

criterions.comment: gettext.js package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
